original: @ga_@#/_/nag po chen po'i bstod pa/sna
analyzed: @ga_@#/_/nag po chen po'i bstod pa/sna
translated: Praise of the Great Lord

original: / @##/_/hum lho phyogs rnam dag tshan dan shing gi gseb/_/ma mo mkha'
analyzed: / @##/_/hum lho phyogs rnam dag tshan dan shing gi gseb/_/ma mo mkha'
translated: Hūṃ! In the south, in the midst of the pure sandalwood forest,🔽from the great maṇḍala of the mātṛkā and ḍākinīs,

original: 'gro'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/_/thugs kyis sprul pa ma ha ka la ni/_/sku
analyzed: 'gro'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/_/thugs kyis sprul pa ma ha ka la ni/_/sku
translated: the emanation of mind, Mahakala,🔽is blue-black in color, with one face and six arms,

original: mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag drug pa/_/stobs chen rab 'bar 'gyings
analyzed: mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag drug pa/_/stobs chen rab 'bar 'gyings
translated: with the appearance of a powerful, blazing, and majestic one,

original: pa'i cha byad can/_/khro gnyer rab 'jigs mthing nag brjid pa'i sku/_/
analyzed: pa'i cha byad can/_/khro gnyer rab 'jigs mthing nag brjid pa'i sku/_/
translated: with a terrifyingly wrathful frown, a majestic blue-black body,

original: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum me 'od 'phro/_/shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig
analyzed: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum me 'od 'phro/_/shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig
translated: with three eyes, red and round, radiating firelight,🔽with the wind of his nose blowing, shaking the world,

original: rten g.yo bar byed/_/rab tu 'jigs pa'i ljags la hum sgra sgrogs/_/rdo rje
analyzed: rten g.yo bar byed/_/rab tu 'jigs pa'i ljags la hum sgra sgrogs/_/rdo rje
translated: with a terrifying tongue, roaring the sound of hūṃ,🔽with a blazing vajra mouth, bared fangs,

original: 'bar ba'i tshhems bsgrad mche ba rtshigs/_/bar nas rdo rje'i khrag gis gser🔽chen 'bebs/_/rmin ma'i a tshhom bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/_/thod pa lngas
analyzed: 'bar ba'i tshhems bsgrad mche ba rtshigs/_/bar nas rdo rje'i khrag gis gser chen 'bebs/_/rmin ma'i a tshhom bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/_/thod pa lngas
translated: with a vajra stream of blood falling from between,🔽with eyebrows shaped like a, blazing like the fire at the end of the eon,🔽adorned with five skulls, with Akṣobhya on his crown,

original: brgyan mi skyod dbu brgyan can/_/drag po dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar/_/
analyzed: brgyan mi skyod dbu brgyan can/_/drag po dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar/_/
translated: with fierce, upward-streaming tawny hair.

original: sgegs pa'i nyams ldan dar gyi cod pan mdzes/_/'gur gyi bum par gsang
analyzed: sgegs pa'i nyams ldan dar gyi cod pan mdzes/_/'gur gyi bum par gsang
translated: You have a handsome, charming appearance, and your silk crown is beautiful,🔽You sing secret love songs in the vase of your throat,

original: ba'i gshugs glu len/_/hum dang phat kyi glu sgra di ri ri/_/sku stod glang chen ko
analyzed: ba'i gshugs glu len/_/hum dang phat kyi glu sgra di ri ri/_/sku stod glang chen ko
translated: The sound of “hum” and “phat” resounds,🔽Your upper body is adorned with an elephant hide,

original: bas brgyan pa yang /_/dpal thul chen po'i gyad las khyad par 'phags/_/sku🔽smad stag gi lpags pas dkris pa ni/_/khams gsum g.yul rgyal srid gsum
analyzed: bas brgyan pa yang /_/dpal thul chen po'i gyad las khyad par 'phags/_/sku smad stag gi lpags pas dkris pa ni/_/khams gsum g.yul rgyal srid gsum
translated: Which is superior to the champion of the great glorious ones,🔽Your lower body is wrapped in a tiger skin,🔽Which conquers the battle of the three realms and overpowers the three worlds,

original: zil gyis gnon/_/bdud bzhi sreg mdzad me dpung klong na 'gying /_/rnam
analyzed: zil gyis gnon/_/bdud bzhi sreg mdzad me dpung klong na 'gying /_/rnam
translated: You are majestic in the midst of a bonfire that burns the four maras,🔽You sit on a human corpse seat in order to abandon conceptual thoughts,

original: rtog spang phyir mi ro'i gdan la bzhugs/_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs phyir phyag
analyzed: rtog spang phyir mi ro'i gdan la bzhugs/_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs phyir phyag
translated: You have six arms in order to perfect the six perfections,

original: drug pa/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/'khor ba'i rnam
analyzed: drug pa/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/'khor ba'i rnam
translated: You are Avalokiteshvara, the lord of the ten bhumis,🔽You have a garland of heads in order to abandon the conceptual thoughts of samsara,

original: rtog spang phyir mgo 'phreng can/_/ma ha ka la khrag mthung rgyal po khyod/_/gri gug
analyzed: rtog spang phyir mgo 'phreng can/_/ma ha ka la khrag mthung rgyal po khyod/_/gri gug
translated: You are the king of blood-drinkers, Mahakala,🔽You cut the life-force of enemies with a blazing flaying knife,

original: rab tu 'bar bas dgra srog gcod/_/thod skam phreng bas dgra bgegs rtshis la
analyzed: rab tu 'bar bas dgra srog gcod/_/thod skam phreng bas dgra bgegs rtshis la
translated: You have a garland of dry skulls that terrify obstructors and enemies,

original: 'debs/_/da ma ru sa mkha' 'gro ma tshhogs bsdud/_/thod rlon rab tu 'bar
analyzed: 'debs/_/da ma ru sa mkha' 'gro ma tshhogs bsdud/_/thod rlon rab tu 'bar
translated: You hold a damaru that gathers a troupe of dakinis,🔽and a freshly severed head dripping with blood.

original: bas dgra khrag gsol/_/mdung rtshe gsum pos srid gsum dbang du bsdud/_/
analyzed: bas dgra khrag gsol/_/mdung rtshe gsum pos srid gsum dbang du bsdud/_/
translated: With three spears you bring the three worlds under control,🔽and with a black bhujagapati you bind all beings from birth.

original: bdud zhags nag pos skye nas 'dzin par byed/_/tshan dan be con klad pa'i rgya
analyzed: bdud zhags nag pos skye nas 'dzin par byed/_/tshan dan be con klad pa'i rgya
translated: With a sandalwood club you crush the skull,🔽and with a hook you summon the three worlds.

original: srubs 'gas/_/khyod kyi sprul pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/gdug pa'i🔽gnod sbyin 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor/_/k+she ta pa la sogs las la 'gyed/_/ma
analyzed: srubs 'gas/_/khyod kyi sprul pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/gdug pa'i gnod sbyin 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor/_/k+she ta pa la sogs las la 'gyed/_/ma
translated: Your emanations are equal to the limits of space,🔽and you are surrounded by a retinue of a hundred thousand wrathful yakshas.🔽You send out Kshetrapala and others to carry out your activities,

original: mo mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs rnams bran du 'khol/_/dkar po'i chos skyong nag po'i
analyzed: mo mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs rnams bran du 'khol/_/dkar po'i chos skyong nag po'i
translated: and you control the assembly of mamos and dakinis as your servants.🔽You are the supreme great deity Mahakala, who protects the virtuous🔽and destroys the forces of evil.🔽We offer you praise and a torma,

original: dpung 'joms pa'i/_/ma ha ka la lha mchog chen po la/_/bdag cag bstod dang gtor ma drag tu 'bul/_/rtshe bas dgongs la bu bzhin skyab du gsol/_/bcol
analyzed: dpung 'joms pa'i/_/ma ha ka la lha mchog chen po la/_/bdag cag bstod dang gtor ma drag tu 'bul/_/rtshe bas dgongs la bu bzhin skyab du gsol/_/bcol
translated: so think of us and protect us like your children.🔽Accomplish the activities we have entrusted to you spontaneously.

original: ba'i phrin las lhun gyis grub par mdzod/_/dpal sha ba ri pas mgon po'i zhal
analyzed: ba'i phrin las lhun gyis grub par mdzod/_/dpal sha ba ri pas mgon po'i zhal
translated: The glorious Shavaripa’s vision of the face of the protector

original: gzigs pa'i dus su don gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o//_//
analyzed: gzigs pa'i dus su don gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o//_//
translated: The praise in terms of the object is the praise of the object of the seeing.🔽

original: po chen po'i bstod pa/
analyzed: po chen po'i bstod pa/
translated: The praise in terms of the object is the praise of the great.
